title: Can login and chat but can't play and news feed wont load!
body: I don't really understand the problem. I haven't done anything to my computer, or the client. I installed the beta, but it was working properly until today. I was playing early and logged off to go to school. Then at night, when I tried to login the mention problem happened. Tried to repair, and did nothing. Tried also to download the game again, but the page fails to load when I try to start the download of the installer. Will appreciate any kind of help on the matter, and would like to know if it's happening to anyone else.

replies.body: We experienced some service outage problems yesterday around the time you posted this, that have been resolved by now. If you're still experiencing this issue, please let me know.

Having a similar issue, can't play games and my client keeps disconnecting saying there's a problem with my connection when everything was perfect 12 hours ago and my internet is purring like a kitten. Pretty annoying!
